channel.title: Client Made by Destruction
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2vmzqja.jpg[/img] Well I have been working on this client for quite some time now and I am ready to release it.
This client will be 100% OPEN and no anti-leeches. If you are going to release this client edited, please give me AND Galkon credits as I used his client base for this.
Well to start off I will be making the credits so people don't spam my thread asking to put credits, so here they are: •40% to Galkon for making this base •40% to me for everything I did to this client •20% to everyone at rune-serber that made the tutorials I used
Now lets get started on the features.
[ul][*]Fixed ALL regular Galkon bugs [*]Fixed the position of the logout button (no longer is cut off) [*]Fixed the position of the HP and Prayer orbs so the logout button does not interfere with it [*]Added 100% working head icons (Smite, Retribution, Redemption, etc.) [*]New Friends list, Ignore list, and Clan chat interfaces 100% working (no clan chat setup, maybe next update) [*]+ MUCH more, find out for yourself![/ul]
Now for some pictures: Clan Chat interface [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2lmaxpv.png[/img] Friends List with hovering icons [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/of2emq.png[/img] Clickable URL's [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2qajlp2.png[/img]
Here are some planned features to be added:
[ul][*]HP and Prayer orb draining (images) [*]Run Energy orb + draining (images)[/ul]
To change the client to connect to your server, find this in client.java: [code]server = "127.0.0.1"[/code]Then change '127.0.0.1' to your server's IP.
If you want to edit the client.java, you must use Notepad++ or any IDE program.
You can find Notepad++ [URL=http://"http://sourceforge.net/projects/notepad-plus/files/"]here[/URL].
Download link for client: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wxyxwymomhu]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wxyxwymomhu[/URL]
Download count: 48
Btw, I'm ¯J²¯, its my rune-serber name.[/CENTER]

item.title: Client Made by Destruction
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:4, topic:314040”][quote author=Destruction link=topic=410518.msg3028326#msg3028326 date=1258183128]

The only thing I noticed new is the go to URL. It actually works…?

EDIT: I’m just kinda browsing it right now and it’s pretty nice. Good j0b shir

Thanks. And yes it actually works. It will open your default browser to any url you’d like. If you would like to know how to use it, just let me know.
[/quote]I wanna learn how to do it lol, I’ll look through your pretty little codes here and find it. Mohoho[/quote]

Well it’s server-sided. You make it like this:

sendMessage("http://google.com#url#");

Replace the ‘sendMessage’ part to ‘sM’ if you’re using Delta.

Then it will say, “Join us at: http://google.com” and is clickable.

Only put the actual url in the message, if you want it say like, ‘Join this website:’, you must edit it from the client.

Read full topic

EDIT: I’m just kinda browsing it right now and it’s pretty nice. Good j0b shir
[/quote]

Thanks. And yes it actually works. It will open your default browser to any url you’d like. If you would like to know how to use it, just let me know.[/quote]I wanna learn how to do it lol, I’ll look through your pretty little codes here and find it. Mohoho

Read full topic

item.title: Client Made by Destruction
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

[CENTER]

2vmzqja.jpg733×88

Well I have been working on this client for quite some time now and I am ready to release it.

This client will be 100% OPEN and no anti-leeches. If you are going to release this client edited, please give me AND Galkon credits as I used his client base for this.

Well to start off I will be making the credits so people don’t spam my thread asking to put credits, so here they are:
•40% to Galkon for making this base
•40% to me for everything I did to this client
•20% to everyone at rune-serber that made the tutorials I used

Now lets get started on the features.

[ul][]Fixed ALL regular Galkon bugs
[]Fixed the position of the logout button (no longer is cut off)
[]Fixed the position of the HP and Prayer orbs so the logout button does not interfere with it
[]Added 100% working head icons (Smite, Retribution, Redemption, etc.)
[]New Friends list, Ignore list, and Clan chat interfaces 100% working (no clan chat setup, maybe next update)
[]+ MUCH more, find out for yourself![/ul]

Now for some pictures:
Clan Chat interface

2lmaxpv.png772×530

Friends List with hovering icons
of2emq.png772×530

Clickable URL’s

Here are some planned features to be added:

[ul][]HP and Prayer orb draining (images)
[]Run Energy orb + draining (images)[/ul]

To change the client to connect to your server, find this in client.java:

server = "127.0.0.1"Then change ‘127.0.0.1’ to your server’s IP.

If you want to edit the client.java, you must use Notepad++ or any IDE program.

You can find Notepad++ here.

Download link for client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wxyxwymomhu

Download count: 48

Btw, I’m ¯J²¯, its my rune-serber name.[/CENTER]
